2.1.7.1.4. url.encodeQueryElement¶

url.encodeQueryElement(element)¶

Encodes a URL query element according to RFC3986.

Parameters:element (Unicode) – The query element to encode for transmission in a URL.
Returns:URL encoded query element
Return type:UTF-8 encoded string.
